005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArrayPublisher;
008import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArraySubscriber;
009import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArrayTopic;
010import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanPublisher;
011import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanSubscriber;
012import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanTopic;
013import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArrayPublisher;
014import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArraySubscriber;
015import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArrayTopic;
016import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoublePublisher;
017import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleSubscriber;
018import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleTopic;
019import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArrayPublisher;
020import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArraySubscriber;
021import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArrayTopic;
022import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatPublisher;
023import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatSubscriber;
024import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatTopic;
025import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArrayPublisher;
026import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArraySubscriber;
027import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArrayTopic;
028import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerPublisher;
029import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerSubscriber;
030import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerTopic;
031import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NTSendableBuilder;
032import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
033import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Publisher;
034import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawPublisher;
035import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawSubscriber;
036import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawTopic;
037import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArrayPublisher;
038import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArraySubscriber;
039import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArrayTopic;
040import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringPublisher;
041import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringSubscriber;
042import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringTopic;
043import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Subscriber;
044import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Topic;
045import edu.wpi.first.util.WPIUtilJNI;
046import edu.wpi.first.util.function.BooleanConsumer;
047import edu.wpi.first.util.function.FloatConsumer;
048import edu.wpi.first.util.function.FloatSupplier;
049import java.util.ArrayList;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
052import java.util.function.Consumer;
053import java.util.function.DoubleConsumer;
054import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
055import java.util.function.LongConsumer;
056import java.util.function.LongSupplier;
057import java.util.function.Supplier;
058
059public class SendableBuilderImpl implements NTSendableBuilder {
060  @FunctionalInterface
061  private interface TimedConsumer<T> {
062    void accept(T value, long time);
063  }
064
065  private static class Property<P extends Publisher, S extends Subscriber>
066      implements AutoCloseable {
067    @Override
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
069    public void close() {
070      try {
071        if (m_pub != null) {
072          m_pub.close();
073        }
074        if (m_sub != null) {
075          m_sub.close();
076        }
077      } catch (Exception e) {
078        // ignore
079      }
080    }
081
082    void update(boolean controllable, long time) {
083      if (controllable && m_sub != null && m_updateLocal != null) {
084        m_updateLocal.accept(m_sub);
085      } else if (m_pub != null && m_updateNetwork != null) {
086        m_updateNetwork.accept(m_pub, time);
087      }
088    }
089
090    P m_pub;
091    S m_sub;
092    TimedConsumer<P> m_updateNetwork;
093    Consumer<S> m_updateLocal;
094  }
095
096  private final List<Property<?, ?>> m_properties = new ArrayList<>();
097  private Runnable m_safeState;
098  private final List<Runnable> m_updateTables = new ArrayList<>();
099  private NetworkTable m_table;
100  private boolean m_controllable;
101  private boolean m_actuator;
102
103  private BooleanPublisher m_controllablePub;
104  private StringPublisher m_typePub;
105  private BooleanPublisher m_actuatorPub;
106
107  private final List<AutoCloseable> m_closeables = new ArrayList<>();
108
109  @Override
110  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
111  public void close() {
112    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
113      m_controllablePub.close();
114    }
115    if (m_typePub != null) {
116      m_typePub.close();
117    }
118    if (m_actuatorPub != null) {
119      m_actuatorPub.close();
120    }
121    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
122      property.close();
123    }
124    for (AutoCloseable closeable : m_closeables) {
125      try {
126        closeable.close();
127      } catch (Exception e) {
128        // ignore
129      }
130    }
131  }
132
133  /**
134   * Set the network table. Must be called prior to any Add* functions being called.
135   *
136   * @param table Network table
137   */
138  public void setTable(NetworkTable table) {
139    m_table = table;
140    m_controllablePub = table.getBooleanTopic(".controllable").publish();
141    m_controllablePub.setDefault(false);
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Get the network table.
146   *
147   * @return The network table
148   */
149  @Override
150  public NetworkTable getTable() {
151    return m_table;
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Return whether this sendable has an associated table.
156   *
157   * @return True if it has a table, false if not.
158   */
159  @Override
160  public boolean isPublished() {
161    return m_table != null;
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Return whether this sendable should be treated as an actuator.
166   *
167   * @return True if actuator, false if not.
168   */
169  public boolean isActuator() {
170    return m_actuator;
171  }
172
173  /** Update the network table values by calling the getters for all properties. */
174  @Override
175  public void update() {
176    long time = WPIUtilJNI.now();
177    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
178      property.update(m_controllable, time);
179    }
180    for (Runnable updateTable : m_updateTables) {
181      updateTable.run();
182    }
183  }
184
185  /** Hook setters for all properties. */
186  public void startListeners() {
187    m_controllable = true;
188    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
189      m_controllablePub.set(true);
190    }
191  }
192
193  /** Unhook setters for all properties. */
194  public void stopListeners() {
195    m_controllable = false;
196    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
197      m_controllablePub.set(false);
198    }
199  }
200
201  /**
202   * Start LiveWindow mode by hooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
203   * function if one was provided.
204   */
205  public void startLiveWindowMode() {
206    if (m_safeState != null) {
207      m_safeState.run();
208    }
209    startListeners();
210  }
211
212  /**
213   * Stop LiveWindow mode by unhooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
214   * function if one was provided.
215   */
216  public void stopLiveWindowMode() {
217    stopListeners();
218    if (m_safeState != null) {
219      m_safeState.run();
220    }
221  }
222
223  /** Clear properties. */
224  @Override
225  public void clearProperties() {
226    stopListeners();
227    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
228      property.close();
229    }
230    m_properties.clear();
231  }
232
233  @Override
234  public void addCloseable(AutoCloseable closeable) {
235    m_closeables.add(closeable);
236  }
237
238  /**
239   * Set the string representation of the named data type that will be used by the smart dashboard
240   * for this sendable.
241   *
242   * @param type data type
243   */
244  @Override
245  public void setSmartDashboardType(String type) {
246    if (m_typePub == null) {
247      m_typePub = m_table.getStringTopic(".type").publish();
248    }
249    m_typePub.set(type);
250  }
251
252  /**
253   * Set a flag indicating if this sendable should be treated as an actuator. By default this flag
254   * is false.
255   *
256   * @param value true if actuator, false if not
257   */
258  @Override
259  public void setActuator(boolean value) {
260    if (m_actuatorPub == null) {
261      m_actuatorPub = m_table.getBooleanTopic(".actuator").publish();
262    }
263    m_actuatorPub.set(value);
264    m_actuator = value;
265  }
266
267  /**
268   * Set the function that should be called to set the Sendable into a safe state. This is called
269   * when entering and exiting Live Window mode.
270   *
271   * @param func function
272   */
273  @Override
274  public void setSafeState(Runnable func) {
275    m_safeState = func;
276  }
277
278  /**
279   * Set the function that should be called to update the network table for things other than
280   * properties. Note this function is not passed the network table object; instead it should use
281   * the topics returned by getTopic().
282   *
283   * @param func function
284   */
285  @Override
286  public void setUpdateTable(Runnable func) {
287    m_updateTables.add(func);
288  }
289
290  /**
291   * Add a property without getters or setters. This can be used to get entry handles for the
292   * function called by setUpdateTable().
293   *
294   * @param key property name
295   * @return Network table entry
296   */
297  @Override
298  public Topic getTopic(String key) {
299    return m_table.getTopic(key);
300  }
301
302  /**
303   * Add a boolean property.
304   *
305   * @param key property name
306   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
307   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
308   */
309  @Override
310  public void addBooleanProperty(String key, BooleanSupplier getter, BooleanConsumer setter) {
311    Property<BooleanPublisher, BooleanSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
312    BooleanTopic topic = m_table.getBooleanTopic(key);
313    if (getter != null) {
314      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
315      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsBoolean(), time);
316    }
317    if (setter != null) {
318      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(false);
319      property.m_updateLocal =
320          sub -> {
321            for (boolean val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
322              setter.accept(val);
323            }
324          };
325    }
326    m_properties.add(property);
327  }
328
329  /**
330   * Add an integer property.
331   *
332   * @param key property name
333   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
334   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
335   */
336  @Override
337  public void addIntegerProperty(String key, LongSupplier getter, LongConsumer setter) {
338    Property<IntegerPublisher, IntegerSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
339    IntegerTopic topic = m_table.getIntegerTopic(key);
340    if (getter != null) {
341      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
342      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsLong(), time);
343    }
344    if (setter != null) {
345      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0);
346      property.m_updateLocal =
347          sub -> {
348            for (long val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
349              setter.accept(val);
350            }
351          };
352    }
353    m_properties.add(property);
354  }
355
356  /**
357   * Add a float property.
358   *
359   * @param key property name
360   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
361   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
362   */
363  @Override
364  public void addFloatProperty(String key, FloatSupplier getter, FloatConsumer setter) {
365    Property<FloatPublisher, FloatSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
366    FloatTopic topic = m_table.getFloatTopic(key);
367    if (getter != null) {
368      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
369      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsFloat(), time);
370    }
371    if (setter != null) {
372      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0.0f);
373      property.m_updateLocal =
374          sub -> {
375            for (float val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
376              setter.accept(val);
377            }
378          };
379    }
380    m_properties.add(property);
381  }
382
383  /**
384   * Add a double property.
385   *
386   * @param key property name
387   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
388   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
389   */
390  @Override
391  public void addDoubleProperty(String key, DoubleSupplier getter, DoubleConsumer setter) {
392    Property<DoublePublisher, DoubleSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
393    DoubleTopic topic = m_table.getDoubleTopic(key);
394    if (getter != null) {
395      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
396      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsDouble(), time);
397    }
398    if (setter != null) {
399      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0.0);
400      property.m_updateLocal =
401          sub -> {
402            for (double val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
403              setter.accept(val);
404            }
405          };
406    }
407    m_properties.add(property);
408  }
409
410  /**
411   * Add a string property.
412   *
413   * @param key property name
414   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
415   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
416   */
417  @Override
418  public void addStringProperty(String key, Supplier<String> getter, Consumer<String> setter) {
419    Property<StringPublisher, StringSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
420    StringTopic topic = m_table.getStringTopic(key);
421    if (getter != null) {
422      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
423      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
424    }
425    if (setter != null) {
426      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe("");
427      property.m_updateLocal =
428          sub -> {
429            for (String val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
430              setter.accept(val);
431            }
432          };
433    }
434    m_properties.add(property);
435  }
436
437  /**
438   * Add a boolean array property.
439   *
440   * @param key property name
441   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
442   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
443   */
444  @Override
445  public void addBooleanArrayProperty(
446      String key, Supplier<boolean[]> getter, Consumer<boolean[]> setter) {
447    Property<BooleanArrayPublisher, BooleanArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
448    BooleanArrayTopic topic = m_table.getBooleanArrayTopic(key);
449    if (getter != null) {
450      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
451      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
452    }
453    if (setter != null) {
454      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new boolean[] {});
455      property.m_updateLocal =
456          sub -> {
457            for (boolean[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
458              setter.accept(val);
459            }
460          };
461    }
462    m_properties.add(property);
463  }
464
465  /**
466   * Add an integer array property.

469   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
470   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
471   */

473  public void addIntegerArrayProperty(
474      String key, Supplier<long[]> getter, Consumer<long[]> setter) {
475    Property<IntegerArrayPublisher, IntegerArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
476    IntegerArrayTopic topic = m_table.getIntegerArrayTopic(key);
477    if (getter != null) {
478      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
479      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
480    }
481    if (setter != null) {
482      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new long[] {});
483      property.m_updateLocal =
484          sub -> {
485            for (long[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
486              setter.accept(val);
487            }
488          };
489    }
490    m_properties.add(property);
491  }

506      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
507      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
508    }
509    if (setter != null) {
510      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new float[] {});
511      property.m_updateLocal =
512          sub -> {
513            for (float[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
514              setter.accept(val);
515            }
516          };
517    }
518    m_properties.add(property);
519  }

536    }
537    if (setter != null) {
538      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new double[] {});

541            for (double[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {

543            }
544          };
545    }

547  }

549  /**
550   * Add a string array property.
551   *
552   * @param key property name
553   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
554   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
555   */
556  @Override
557  public void addStringArrayProperty(
558      String key, Supplier<String[]> getter, Consumer<String[]> setter) {
559    Property<StringArrayPublisher, StringArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
560    StringArrayTopic topic = m_table.getStringArrayTopic(key);
561    if (getter != null) {
562      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
563      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
564    }
565    if (setter != null) {
566      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new String[] {});
567      property.m_updateLocal =
568          sub -> {
569            for (String[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
570              setter.accept(val);
571            }
572          };
573    }
574    m_properties.add(property);
575  }
576
577  /**
578   * Add a raw property.
579   *
580   * @param key property name
581   * @param typeString type string
582   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
583   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
584   */
585  @Override
586  public void addRawProperty(
587      String key, String typeString, Supplier<byte[]> getter, Consumer<byte[]> setter) {
588    Property<RawPublisher, RawSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
589    RawTopic topic = m_table.getRawTopic(key);
590    if (getter != null) {
591      property.m_pub = topic.publish(typeString);
592      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
593    }
594    if (setter != null) {
595      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(typeString, new byte[] {});
596      property.m_updateLocal =
597          sub -> {
598            for (byte[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
599              setter.accept(val);
600            }
601          };
602    }
603    m_properties.add(property);
604  }
605}
